name: Bonerium BoneSwap
description: $BSWP is a highly versatile token that plays an essential role in the success of the Bonerium network. BSWP has been designed to provide a range of utilities to network users, with one of its most notable features being its ability to generate fees through new swaps on Bone Swap. These fees are then used to fund the ongoing development of the Bonerium network, making it a highly valuable asset for users who wish to access the decentralized exchange.
